body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:
/kind bug



**What happened**:
[testgrid](https://k8s-testgrid.appspot.com/google-gce#gce-alpha-features)
[logs](https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-e2e-gce-alpha-features/13933)

```
I0802 21:12:24.694]     [91m[1mTest Panicked[0m
I0802 21:12:24.694]     [91mruntime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference[0m
I0802 21:12:24.695]     /usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:489
I0802 21:12:24.695] 
I0802 21:12:24.695]     [91mFull Stack Trace[0m
I0802 21:12:24.695]     	/usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:489 +0x2cf
I0802 21:12:24.696]     k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/storage.glob..func5.1()
I0802 21:12:24.696]     	/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/storage/persistent_volumes-local.go:112 +0x2df
I0802 21:12:24.696]     k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/onsi/ginkgo/internal/leafnodes.(*runner).runSync(0xc4203bb080, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, ...)
I0802 21:12:24.696]     	/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/e2e.go:344 +0x219
I0802 21:12:24.696]     k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e.TestE2E(0xc4206b9ba0)
I0802 21:12:24.696]     	/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/e2e_test.go:41 +0x2b
I0802 21:12:24.696]     testing.tRunner(0xc4206b9ba0, 0x35cadf0)
I0802 21:12:24.696]     	/usr/local/go/src/testing/testing.go:657 +0x96
I0802 21:12:24.697]     created by testing.(*T).Run
I0802 21:12:24.697]     	/usr/local/go/src/testing/testing.go:697 +0x2ca
```

**What you expected to happen**:
Test should pass

title: Local pv tests panicking
